  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Initialize the extension for parsing using the given <code>Parser</code>.

The extension should use the AsmParser interfaces to register its parsing routines.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/mc/lib/mc/mcparser/goffasmparser-cpp/#l00027">27</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/mc/lib/mc/mcparser/goffasmparser-cpp">GOFFAsmParser.cpp</a>.
